alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 10:02AM CDT until June 15 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MITCHELL AND FLOYD COUNTIES... At 1001 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rudd, or 8 miles south of Osage, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Osage and Floyd around 1010 AM CDT. Riceville around 1025 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include County Roads B 60 And T 18, Rock Creek, Idlewilde State Park, Roseville, Howardville, Brownville and County Roads B 20 And T 26. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
